name: npr
title: National Public Radio (NPR)
description: This chapter includes content provided by National Public Radio (NPR). Tap **Allow and continue** to load this content, or view [NPR's privacy policy](https://www.npr.org/about-npr/179878450/privacy-policy) for more information.
shortDescription: NPR is an American nonprofit media organisation based in Washington D.C. Details about collected data are available in NPR's [privacy policy](https://www.npr.org/about-npr/179878450/privacy-policy) and [terms of service](https://www.npr.org/about-npr/179876898/terms-of-use)

name: default
description: Hier finden Sie einen externen Inhalt, der Daten über Sie sammeln und an Dritte übermitteln kann. Tippen Sie auf **Eingebetteten Inhalt laden** um diesen Inhalt anzuzeigen.
